sources.title: Ambition | Full Thriller Movie
sources.description:
***This film is under non-exclusive license from Shoreline Entertainment. All rights reserved***

Ambition - When a sinister figure offers them success in exchange for murder, a group of old school friends struggle with paranoia and distrust as they turn on each other to complete the arrangement.

2005
Stars: Matthew Rutherford, Luke Roberts, Alex Childs

metadata.Plot: The story of one of the most important space exploration endeavours of this decade. Just as Gillen's enigmatic Master encourages Franciosi's Apprentice to seek out the key to life amidst a rugged alien landscape, ESA has been on a decade-long ambitious journey of its own, to unlock the mysteries of a comet and the origins of our Solar System with its Rosetta spacecraft, hundreds of millions of kilometres from Earth. Ambition complements the ongoing communication about Rosetta and adds a "human dimension" to the scientific and technological achievements of the mission, which include curiosity, drive and ambition.
metadata.Writer: Tomasz Baginski, Afolabi Kuti, Tobiasz Piatkowski
